channel.title: Dreamcast Village is Recruiting
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Dreamcast Village is Recruiting"

item.title: Re: Dreamcast Village is Recruiting
item.content:encoded: Looking for active villagers. Now have 84 upgrades, summoning kaiju, and now have epic monument.

item.title: Re: Dreamcast Village is Recruiting
item.content:encoded: Still need stong villagers to help out in the village. We now have 82 upgrades and our now on our way to getting epic monument.

item.title: Dreamcast Village is Recruiting
item.content:encoded: Need Villagers we currently have 61 upgrades and have NRF but very few villagers, it would even be good if you could send a active alt over, also looking for a Vice-Kage to help out with the village. Just apply if interested or pm me if you have any questions.
